aslist¶

class isopy.aslist[source]¶

Convert the input to a IsopyList.

Parameters

  • items (list of str) – List of strings to be parsed.

  • skip_duplicates (bool) – If True all duplicate items will be removed from the list. This only applies during initialisation of the list. Default value is False.

  • allow_duplicates (bool) – If False a StringDuplicateError will be raised if the list contains any duplicate items. This only applies during initialisation of the list. Default Value is True.

Returns

IsopyList consisiting of items. If item already is an IsopyList it is returned instead of a copy if no other parameters are given.

Return type

MassList, ElementList, IsotopeList or RatioList

Raises

  • ValueError – Raised if items cannot be parsed into an IsopyList

  • StringDuplicateError – Raised when a string already exist in the list and allow_duplicates = False

Examples

>>> a = isopy.aslist(['99ru', '105pd', '111cd'])
>>> b = isopy.aslist(a)
>>> a is b
True
>>> c = isopy.list_(a)
>>> a is c
False
>>> a == c
True
